function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate implementation of COVID-19 IPC measures in workplace settings","Impact":"Increased risk of workplace COVID-19 outbreaks and spread to the wider community","Mitigation":"Ensure comprehensive implementation of IPC measures, including surveillance, contact tracing, case isolation, facility zoning, and universal masking","Technologies":"Surveillance systems, contact tracing apps, facility zoning technologies","People":"Employees, wider community","Owner":"Employers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Reliance on masking alone for workplace outbreak prevention","Impact":"Inadequate protection against workplace COVID-19 outbreaks","Mitigation":"Implement comprehensive IPC measures beyond masking, including surveillance, contact tracing, and case isolation","Technologies":"Surveillance systems, contact tracing apps","People":"Employees, wider community","Owner":"Employers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Persistent high COVID-19 case numbers despite vaccination programs","Impact":"Continued risk of workplace COVID-19 outbreaks","Mitigation":"Continued vigilance and implementation of comprehensive IPC measures to protect workers","Technologies":"Surveillance systems, contact tracing apps, facility zoning technologies","People":"Employees, wider community","Owner":"Employers, public health authorities"}]}
